extendedInfo.description: Using Colony Bank Mobile App, Colony Bank's free* consumer mobile banking application, you can manage your money anytime, anywhereâfrom your mobile device! Colony Bank Mobile App is a fast and secure way for Colony Bank consumer customers to check balances, view account activity, pay bills and make transfers between accounts. Colony Bank Mobile App is available 24/7.Mobile banking transmissions are protected by robust 128-bit SSL (Secure Socket Layer) to prevent unauthorized access.Login to Colony Bank Mobile App and you can undertake a full range of banking activities conveniently and securely, including the following:VIEW ACCOUNT ACTIVITY-View account available balances, recent transactions and pending deposits-Detailed transaction history, including date, location, amount, and moreâjust like using online bankingMAKE TRANSFERS-Transfer money between Colony Bank accountsPAY BILLS-Schedule payments and pay billsâright from your mobile device-If youâre already a Bill Pay customer, the payees you have already set up using the online version of Bill Pay are automatically available for use in the Colony Bank Mobile App Bill Pay.LOCATE BRANCHES-Find Colony Bank branch locations using your current location or enter the zip code or address of the area you wish to search. Youâll be provided a list of branches with the address and distance from your current location.For more information about Colony Bank and access to efficient and secure online banking services visit www.colonybank.com, email customersupport@colonybank.com, or call 800-873-6404. Colony Bank is an equal housing lender and member of FDIC. Internet access permissions are necessary for the Colony Bank Mobile App to connect with Colony Bank mobile banking. At this time, Colony Bank Mobile App is designed for consumer customer use only.*Your mobile carrierâs message and data rates may apply.
